com.joliciel.talismane.parser

Class ReduceTransition

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.joliciel.talismane.parser.AbstractTransition
      • com.joliciel.talismane.parser.ReduceTransition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Transition, java.lang.Comparable<Transition>

    public class ReduceTransition
extends AbstractTransition
implements Transition
    Reduce the stack, by popping Stack[0], without creating a new dependency.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli.
